control_attributes.control_description: The organization:a. Employs spam protection mechanisms at information system entry and exit points to detect and take action on unsolicited messages; andb. Updates spam protection mechanisms when new releases are available in accordance with organizational configuration management policy and procedures.

Control Statement: The organization:a. Employs spam protection mechanisms at information system entry and exit points to detect and take action on unsolicited messages; andb. Updates spam protection mechanisms when new releases are available in accordance with organizational configuration management policy and procedures.
